article_title: One Year Update Of Indiana's Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.description: After nearly a year of operation, the data is in, and the early outcomes of HIP 2,0 are in. The results so far have been little personal responsibility for enrollees, and higher costs for taxpayers. Other states considering a similar designed Obamacare Medicaid expansion expansion should think twice.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: After nearly a year of operation, the data is in, and the early outcomes of HIP 2,0 are in.
